relation: Part two of Mother Alternate places Julian in a sprawling city from which there is no escape. As he draws ever closer to the truth regarding Ninten and his battle against Giegue, he is met with opposition the likes of which he's never experienced. How will he overcome the obstacles laid before him by the enigmatic Diva?

textBeforeTable: > Z T S P M E C < Other Submissions by Giampi The first leg of a three-part epic that takes place five years after EarthBound Zero and deals with the aftermath of Giegue's first attack on Earth. A boy named Julian develops mysterious psychic abilities and becomes the target of interstellar pirates, but is there a deeper meaning behind the cataclysmic events going on around him? Together with some unlikely allies, he sets out for answers, even if they take him to the ends of the Earth...
